parsedContentPreview: {"id":"egy_beg_04_numbers","title":{"arabic":"الأرقام والأسعار","english":"Numbers and Prices","transliteration":"El arqam wel as'aar"},"level":"beginner","description":{"english":"Learn how to count from 0 to 10 in Egyptian Arabic and how to ask 'How much?' when shopping.","arabic":"تعلم العد من 0 لـ 10 بالمصري وازاي تسأل 'بكام؟' وانت بتشتري."},"learningObjectives":["Count from 0 to 10 in Egyptian Arabic","Ask about prices using 'Bekam'","Understand basic currency vocabulary (Geneh)"],"estimatedDuration":20,"prerequisites":["Basic greetings"],"subLessons":[{"id":"sub_01_counting","title":{"arabic":"العد من صفر لعشرة","english":"Counting from 0 to 10","transliteration":"El ad men sefr le ashara"},"content":{"title":{"arabic":"الأرقام الأساسية","english":"Basic Numbers","transliteration":"El arqam el asaseya"},"phrases":[{"arabic":"صفر","english":"Zero","transliteration":"Sefr"},{"arabic":"واحد","english":"One","transliteration":"Wahed"},{"arabic":"اتنين","english":"Two","transliteration":"Etnein"},{"arabic":"تلاتة","english":"Three","transliteration":"Talata"},{"arabic":"أربعة","english":"Four","transliteration":"Arbaa"},{"arabic":"خمسة","english":"Five","transliteration":"Khamsa"},{"arabic":"ستة","english":"Six","transliteration":"Setta"},{"arabic":"سبعة","english":"Seven","transliteration":"Sabaa"},{"arabic":"تمنية","english":"Eight","transliteration":"Tamanya"},{"arabic":"تسعة","english":"Nine","transliteration":"Tesaa"},{"arabic":"عشرة","english":"Ten","transliteration":"Ashara"}],"explanations":[{"english":"Egyptian Arabic numbers are very similar to Standard Arabic but pronounced slightly differently. Memorizing 1-10 is essential as they form the basis for all other numbers."}]},"exercises":[{"id":"ex_01_match_number","type":"matching","question":{"english":"Match the Egyptian Arabic number to the digit.","arabic":"وصل الرقم المصري بالرقم الحسابي."},"options":[{"arabic":"خمسة","english":"5","transliteration":"Khamsa","isCorrect":true},{"arabic":"تلاتة","englis
